caption.title: Comparison between the homology model of HBV-RT and the crystal structure of HIV-1-RT. (A) Ribbon diagram of HBV-RT. Three subdomains are described: Fingers (residues 1-49 and 90-172, purple), palm (residues 50-89 and 173-267, blue), and thumb (residues 268-351, green). (B) HBV-RT (blue) and HIV-1-RT (yellow) are superimposed; regions showing significant differences are marked (*). Amino acids of the catalytic triad and Nevirapine are displayed in sticks.
